subject: Visual Arts
studyNotes: Artists use the elements of art — line, shape, colour, texture, and form — to create meaning.
Art can reflect personal, cultural, or historical contexts.
Critiquing art involves describing, analysing, and interpreting artworks.

flashcards.a: How the elements are arranged within an artwork.

questions.q: Which is an element of art?
Discuss how artists communicate ideas through colour and form.
